author: sky.cactus
content:
> W.r.t. time zones, is there something that works better for you <@!301186049323958275> ? It seems most folks attending right now are North America or Europe based.
<@!552133098075193354> I'm in SE Asia, so the worst possible time zone to sync with both US and EU.  I'm fine with just watching call recordings though, I'm not a big fan of voice/video calls anyway so I don't mind being left out.  ðŸ™‚

author: sky.cactus
content: The only downside is that I cannot advocate in the call directly, I need someone else to advocate on my behalf.

author: sky.cactus
content:
> <@!376568077950910466> <@!301186049323958275> re: changes to the spec for FEE_CAP, I think an implementers' call makes sense. I hadn't scheduled one yet because it seemed like many streams of work were in progress and I wanted to wait a bit until we had some "milestones" to report. Maybe late August is what we should aim for?
<@!552133098075193354> I think I'm convinced on keeping `FEE_CAP` now.  I didn't realize that `FEE_CAP` could be lower than `BASE_FEE + GAS_PREMIUM`.  With that knowledge, I think `FEE_CAP` as a variable is much more reasonable than I used to think.

author: iannorden
content: <@!552133098075193354> I'm quite flexible this far out, late august sounds good to me
